hadiths.arabic: إِنَّمَا الأَعْمَالُ بِالنِّيَّاتِ، وَإِنَّمَا لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مَا نَوَى
hadiths.text: The reward of deeds depends upon the intentions and every person will get the reward according to what he has intended.

hadiths.arabic: لاَ يُؤْمِنُ أَحَدُكُمْ حَتَّى يُحِبَّ لأَخِيهِ مَا يُحِبُّ لِنَفْسِهِ
hadiths.text: None of you will have faith till he wishes for his brother what he likes for himself.

hadiths.arabic: مَنْ كَانَ يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الآخِرِ فَلْيَقُلْ خَيْرًا أَوْ لِيَصْمُتْ
hadiths.text: Whoever believes in Allah and the Last Day should speak a good word or remain silent.

hadiths.book: Book of Virtue, Good Manners and Joining of the Ties of Relationship
hadiths.arabic: الْمُسْلِمُ مَنْ سَلِمَ الْمُسْلِمُونَ مِنْ لِسَانِهِ وَيَدِهِ
hadiths.text: A Muslim is the one who avoids harming Muslims with his tongue and hands.

hadiths.arabic: طَلَبُ الْعِلْمِ فَرِيضَةٌ عَلَى كُلِّ مُسْلِمٍ
hadiths.text: Seeking knowledge is an obligation upon every Muslim.

hadiths.arabic: مَنْ صَامَ رَمَضَانَ إِيمَانًا وَاحْتِسَابًا غُفِرَ لَهُ مَا تَقَدَّمَ مِنْ ذَنْبِهِ
hadiths.text: Whoever fasts during the month of Ramadan out of sincere faith, and hoping to attain Allah's rewards, then all his past sins will be forgiven.

hadiths.arabic: الطُّهُورُ شَطْرُ الإِيمَانِ، وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ تَمْلأُ الْمِيزَانَ
hadiths.text: Cleanliness is half of faith and Alhamdulillah (Praise be to Allah) fills the scale.

hadiths.arabic: يَا مَعْشَرَ الشَّبَابِ مَنِ اسْتَطَاعَ مِنْكُمُ الْبَاءَةَ فَلْيَتَزَوَّجْ، فَإِنَّهُ أَغَضُّ لِلْبَصَرِ وَأَحْصَنُ لِلْفَرْجِ
hadiths.text: O young men, whoever among you can afford to get married, let him do so, for it is more effective in lowering the gaze and guarding one's chastity.

hadiths.arabic: لَا يَشْكُرُ اللَّهَ مَنْ لَا يَشْكُرُ النَّاسَ
hadiths.text: He who does not thank people does not thank Allah.
